Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: 64-bit MS Windows

name: Multiple Criteria-Options Decisions
short_description:
This program provides the user with an easy way to perform simple decision analysis when there are many criteria by which to select many options. The program can reduce hours of manual, paper-based analysis to a few minutes of a user's time. The program displays the results along with the criteria and their weights, and the options with their weights by criteria and as a whole.

This program will provide a downloadable executable program for Windows. The program is an adaptation of my program written 10 years ago that uses the older versions of Microsoft Access. Interest on the blog for The Third Way indicated a desire for a program for public use.
summary: Multiple criteria, multiple option decision analysis
